mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (id, user_id, room_id, rating, content, img, created_at) VALUES (seq_reviews.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{roomId}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{img}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(r.rating), 1), 0) AS avgRating, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM reviews r WHERE r.room_id = #{roomId}
